Package fr.internetcartographier.model.internetgraph

Class Edge

java.lang.Object
fr.internetcartographier.model.internetgraph.Edge
public class Edge extends Object
The Edge class represents a connection between two nodes in a graph, with properties such as direction, response time, and geolocation data.

  • Constructor Summary

      public Edge(Edge edge)

    • Edge

      public Edge(Node nodeA, Node nodeB, boolean isDirect, double responseTime)
      Constructs an Edge object with specified nodes, direction, and response time.
      Parameters:
      nodeA - The starting node of the edge.
      nodeB - The ending node of the edge.
      isDirect - Indicates whether the edge is directed.
      responseTime - The response time associated with the edge.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If either node is null or both nodes are the same.
